replies.msg:
想問下有無人知道UCL既teaching arrangement會係點? 係唔係成個學年都會變左做online learning, 定係佢會因應個疫情而開番face to face?

UCL send左依段野:
How your modules will be taught
All the learning activity for the core content of your modules will take place online – including lectures, tutorials (where applicable), seminars and assessments. A limited amount of face-to-face educational activity will be offered on campus in the form of research workshops (with alternative activities for those of you unable to join us in person). More information on these workshops will be provided before the start of term.

痴線咁都要Po上連燈問 -.-

你估個個都好似你咁讀UCL po上黎晒命咩 -.-

你自己email department啦大佬

拉
